member.name: IUIAnimationVariable.GetCurrentStoryboard
member.summary: Gets the storyboard that is currently animating the animation variable.
member.param: The current storyboard, or NULL if no storyboard is currently animating the animation variable.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See UIAnimation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationVariable.GetFinalIntegerValue
member.summary:
Gets the final value of the animation variable as an integer.
This is the value after all currently scheduled animations have completed.
member.param: The final value of the animation variable, converted to an INT32 value.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

listheader.description: The final value of the animation variable cannot be determined at this time.

member.name: IUIAnimationVariable.GetFinalValue
member.summary:
Gets the final value of the animation variable.
This is the value after all currently scheduled animations have completed.
member.param: The final value of the animation variable.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

listheader.description: The final value of the animation variable cannot be determined at this time.

member.name: IUIAnimationVariable.GetIntegerValue
member.summary: Gets the current value of the animation variable as an integer.
member.param: The current value of the animation variable, converted to an INT32 value.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationVariable.GetPreviousIntegerValue
member.summary:
Gets the previous value of the animation variable as an integer.
This is the value of the animation variable before the most recent update.
member.param: The previous value of the animation variable, converted to an INT32 value.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationVariable.GetPreviousValue
member.summary: Gets the previous value of the animation variable. This is the value of the animation variable before the most recent update.
member.param: The previous value of the animation variable.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationVariable.GetTag
member.summary: Gets the tag for an animation variable.
member.param: The object portion of the tag.
The identifier portion of the tag.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

listheader.description: The animation variable's tag was not set.

member.name: IUIAnimationVariable.GetValue
member.summary: Gets the current value of the animation variable.
member.param: The current value of the animation variable.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationVariable.SetLowerBound
member.summary: Sets the lower bound (floor) for the animation variable. The value of the animation variable should not fall below the specified value.
member.param: The lower bound for the animation variable.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationVariable.SetRoundingMode
member.summary: Specifies the rounding mode for the animation variable.
member.param: The rounding mode for the animation variable.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationVariable.SetTag
member.summary: Sets the tag for an animation variable.
member.param: The object portion of the tag. This parameter can be NULL.
The identifier portion of the tag.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationVariable.SetUpperBound
member.summary: Sets an upper bound (ceiling) for the animation variable. The value of the animation variable should not rise above the specified value.
member.param: The upper bound for the animation variable.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationVariable.SetVariableChangeHandler
member.summary: Specifies a variable change handler. This handler is notified of changes to the value of the animation variable.

param.name: handler
param.para: The specified object must implement the interface or be NULL.

member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationVariable.SetVariableIntegerChangeHandler
member.summary: Specifies an integer variable change handler. This handler is notified of changes to the integer value of the animation variable.

param.name: handler
param.para: The specified object must implement the interface or be NULL.

member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationVariable
member.summary: Defines an animation variable, which represents a visual element that can be animated.
